value.string:
________________________________________________________
WELCOME TO NEOS!
The Network-Enabled Optimization System
developed by
The Optimization Technology Center of Argonne National Laboratory and Northwestern University ________________________________________________________
I. ABSTRACT
This server accepts optimization problems sent electronically, and solves them using the computing facilities of the Optimization Technology Center and other participating hosts. The user can obtain information on the optimization problem, the solution process, and the solution. Further, users can register their own software with this server, making their code available to other users.
This server is under construction. Comments and suggestions should be sent to support@neos-server.org. We have assumed familiarity with basic optimization terminology. If you need additional information, consult
J. More' and S. Wright, Optimization Software Guide, SIAM Publications, 1993.
II. DISCLAIMER
This information is provided without any express or implied warranty. In particular, there is no warranty of any kind concerning the fitness of this information for any particular purpose.
